text: Iodine pentafluoride is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is IF5. It has iodine and fluoride ions. The iodine is in its +5 oxidation state. ==Properties== Iodine pentafluoride is a pale yellow liquid. It is an interhalogen. It is also a powerful oxidizing agent. It reacts with water to make hydrofluoric acid. ==Preparation== Iodine pentafluoride is made by burning iodine in fluorine gas. ==Uses== It is used in organic chemistry (amine to nitrile conversion after hydrolysis). ==Related pages== *Iodine heptafluoride *Iodine trifluoride Category:Iodine compounds Category:Fluorine compounds
title: Iodine pentafluoride
